ISSUE.TITLE: There is a problem with the master election
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** bug introduced by https://github.com/seaweedfs/seaweedfs/commit/4511edc8717b1f54f23469ca0ad20d199c2db2eb Since raft.GrpcServer is not anonymously nested weed_raft. RaftServer structure, so weed_raft. The RaftServer is no longer inherited to raft.GrpcServer. When called based on grpc, the error "method xx not implemented" is returned.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: reset wait time on a successful retry
